title: BillTracks
description:
Bill Tracks simplifies the complexities of U.S. legislation with an AI-powered chatbot that provides instant, clear, and concise bill summaries. Stay informed and engaged with Congress without wading through complex legal jargon.

We have over 50 users after launching the site two weeks ago and have had almost 2,000 site views!!!! Thank you for all the support and excited for what tomorrow holds!
